message: UCL DARK lab will supervise MSc projects this year. For master students that are interested in doing a project with us, please fill this [form](https://forms.gle/J9pZbHpDH22JEgr9A).
[The NetHack Learning Environment](https://arxiv.org/abs/2006.13760) has been accepted by NeurIPS 2020.
[WordCraft: An Environment for Benchmarking Commonsense Agents](https://arxiv.org/abs/2007.09185) has been accepted by 1st Workshop on Language in Reinforcement Learning, ICML 2020.
[RIDE: Rewarding Impact-Driven Exploration for Procedurally-Generated Environments](https://arxiv.org/abs/2002.12292) has been accepted by ICLR 2020.
[RTFM: Generalising to Novel Environment Dynamics via Reading](https://arxiv.org/abs/1910.08210) has been accepted by ICLR 2020.
